overview: Indra return nine months of sea surprised many people. Especially Muharram, lover Indra has now become fiancee Bukhari and be married soon. Indra grateful for the return of the tragedy of the storm that claimed two lives of his friends and him ashore on an island for nine months. Now, Indra felt pointless.
tagline: Because people want to live in love
title: Berlari Ke Langit
